statements: SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_name, taxable_income FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM financial_reports WHERE tax_rate > 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM financial_reports WHERE taxable_income > 50000;
SELECT AVG(tax_rate) AS avg_tax_rate FROM financial_reports;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE taxable_income > 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, tax_rate FROM financial_reports WHERE tax_rate < 20
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE taxable_income BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT report_name, taxable_income FROM financial_reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%Q2%' ORDER BY tax_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_planning ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, end_date FROM financial_planning WHERE end_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM financial_planning WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name AS 'Financial Report Name', report_date AS 'Date' FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, end_date, DATE_PART('day', end_date - start_date) AS duration_days FROM financial_planning ORDER BY duration_days DESC;
SELECT report_name, plan_name FROM financial_reports INNER JOIN financial_planning ON report_id = plan_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT sales_amount, expenses_amount FROM financial_reports;
SELECT profit FROM financial_reports WHERE profit > 5000;
SELECT tax_paid, tax_return FROM tax_reports WHERE tax_return > tax_paid;
SELECT budget_amount, predicted_expenses FROM financial_planning WHERE budget_amount > predicted_expenses;
SELECT sales_amount, profit, expenses_amount FROM financial_reports WHERE sales_amount > 10000 AND profit < 5000 ORDER BY profit DESC
SELECT * FROM tax_reports WHERE tax_return > 2000
SELECT budget_amount AS budget, predicted_expenses AS expenses FROM financial_planning WHERE budget_amount > 50000 ORDER BY expenses DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_reports LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales, AVG(expenses_amount) AS avg_expenses FROM financial_reports
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date, report_data FROM financial_reports;
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_date, document_data FROM tax_documents WHERE document_type='Income';
SELECT * FROM financial_planning ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role='Admin';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_date FROM tax_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_data FROM financial_planning WHERE plan_name LIKE '%budget%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_type, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_type = 'Income';
SELECT line_description, line_amount FROM report_lines ORDER BY line_amount DESC;
SELECT tax_type, tax_amount FROM tax_information WHERE tax_type = 'VAT';
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM financial_planning WHERE plan_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_type = 'Income Statement';
SELECT report_date, report_type, report_data FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_type, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM financial_reports GROUP BY report_id, report_type;
SELECT * FROM report_lines rl JOIN financial_reports fr ON rl.report_id = fr.report_id WHERE rl.line_amount > 1000;
SELECT plan_name, plan_start_date, plan_end_date FROM financial_planning WHERE plan_end_date > '2022-01-01';
